import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
df1 = pd.read_csv("/content/drive/Shareddrives/á„‹á…³á†¼á„†á…¥á„…á…¥á„…á…¥/beauty_data_moeum.csv")
df2 = pd.read_csv("/content/drive/Shareddrives/á„‹á…³á†¼á„†á…¥á„…á…¥á„…á…¥/undong_data_moeum.csv")
df3 = pd.read_csv("/content/drive/Shareddrives/á„‹á…³á†¼á„†á…¥á„…á…¥á„…á…¥/mukbang_data_moeum.csv")
df4 = pd.read_csv("/content/drive/Shareddrives/á„‹á…³á†¼á„†á…¥á„…á…¥á„…á…¥/jisik_data_moeum.csv")
df5 = pd.read_csv("/content/drive/Shareddrives/á„‹á…³á†¼á„†á…¥á„…á…¥á„…á…¥/vlog_data_moeum.csv")
df = pd.concat([df1, df2, df3, df4, df5])
df = df.dropna(axis=0)
display(df)

source:
# ìˆ˜ì§‘ ì‹œì‘í•  ë‚ ì§œë¥¼ ì´ í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ì§€ì •(ìˆ˜ì§‘í•˜ëŠ” ë‹¹ì¼ ë‚ ì§œ í˜¹ì€ ì´ì „ì— ìˆ˜ì§‘í•œ ë°ì´í„° ì¤‘ ê°€ì¥ ì˜ˆì „ ê°’

def get_youtube_vedio_search_list(keyword):    
    page_token = ''
    while(True):
    	##API í˜¸ì¶œ	
        search_response = youtube.search().list(
            
            type='video',
            maxResults = 50,       #í•œ ë²ˆì— ê°€ì ¸ì˜¤ëŠ” ë°ì´í„° ìˆ˜
            part = 'snippet, id',   
            q = keyword,		#ê²€ìƒ‰ í‚¤ì›Œë“œ
            regionCode = 'KR',		#ì§€ì—­. í•œêµ­ì€ KR
            pageToken = page_token,
            publishedBefore = '2020-03-30T00:00:00Z',
            publishedAfter = calcuate_next_publish_time('2020-03-30T00:00:00Z')
        ).execute()
        ##ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¨ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
        for item in search_response['items']:
            new_data = {'title':'not-yet','channel_name':'not-yet','video_id':'not-yet','views':'not-yet', 'subs':'not-yet', 'publish_time':'not-yet'}
            new_data['title'] = item['snippet']['title']
            new_data['channel_name'] = item['snippet']['channelTitle']
            new_data['video_id'] = item['id']['videoId']
            new_data['channel_id'] = item['snippet']['channelId']

            new_data['publish_time'] = item['snippet']['publishTime']
            df.loc[len(df)] = new_data  ##df 2
        ###ë‹¤ìŒ í˜ì´ì§€ í† í° ì°¾ê¸°
        if ('nextPageToken' in search_response):
            page_token = search_response['nextPageToken']
        else:
            print('count : ', len(df)) ## df 1
            start_time = calcuate_next_publish_time(start_time)
            page_token=''

for index in range(0, len(df)): ###
    response = youtube.videos().list(
        part = 'statistics', id = df.loc[index, 'video_id']).execute()  
    if len(response['items']) > 0:
        df.loc[index, 'views'] = response['items'][0]['statistics'].get('viewCount')

for index in range(0, len(df)): ###
    response = youtube.channels().list(
        part = 'statistics', id = df.loc[index, 'channel_id']).execute()
    if len(response['items']) > 0:
        df.loc[index, 'subs'] = response['items'][0]['statistics'].get('subscriberCount')

#### like count way 2
id = "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v="+df1['video_id']
df1['video_id'] = list(id)

source:
def getLikes(link):
  page = requests.get(link)
  likes = re.search("with (\d*.\d*.\d*)", page.text)
  return likes
